```{python}
# Example: Simple Matplotlib plot
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
plt.plot(x, y, label='sin(x)')
plt.title("Example Plot")
plt.xlabel("X-axis")
plt.ylabel("Y-axis")
plt.legend()
plt.show()
```
